item.description:
MerKaBa Classic, the originalFlower of Life Workshop with Maureen St. Germain
the most prolific facilitator of the program
Friday, April 12 - Sunday, April 14
Advanced MerKaBa: Monday, April 15

You will learn the MerKaBa Meditation based on Sacred Geometry as taught by Drunvalo Melchizedek and found in the Secrets of the Flower of Life Vol. I or II. Maureen is the author of the Amazon.com best seller, Beyond the Flower of Life.
Accelerate your ascension process - assist with planetary transformation - achieve direct contact with your higher self - remember your mission on earth - reawaken your connections with God.
The Flower of Life workshop places high emphasis on gaining or fine-tuning your direct connection to your Higher Self along with a specific focus on opening the heart. In addition to the Merkaba Meditation, we will cover the Unity Breath as taught by Drunvalo in the Earth Sky workshop and some advanced programming techniques.
Maureen's own personal connections with the Angels, Ascended Masters, Hathors and Divine Feminine may also be explored.


Flower of Life is a 2.5-day workshop starting the first evening from 7pm-9pm and continuing the following two days from 9am - 6pm. $449.00 per person. ($50 OFF your registration fee when using coupon code AHigherBalance(No spaces; caps don't matter) Register and pay online at the FOL Website. (www.MaureenStGermain.com)

Advanced FOL workshop will take place Sunday; it is $199 and includes Maureen's book Beyond the Flower of Life. Register online. Also $50 off this program instantly - using AHigherBalancecoupon code (no spaces: caps don't matter). (If you are signing up for both workshops, you must use the coupon code on each registration)

Maureen was certified as a FOL facilitator by Drunvalo Melchizedek and has been teaching the Flower of Life workshop since 1995. She has taught the Merkaba Meditation in over eight countries worldwide. This is a very special program and A Higher Balance is delighted to host Maureen for this special workshop.

Â
item.name: The Flower of Life Workshop with Maureen St. Germain
